basics.label: HEALTHCARE ADMINISTRATION INTERN
basics.summary: To find a position that will utilize my knowledge while working in tandem with in a highly-regarded setting. Skilled at communicating, organizing and solving problems to raise the stature and rankings of health care facilities.
